works.description:
This is a Google map listing that we have
 
requested to have removed through the Google maps error reporting
interface  
at least a dozen times.

We have never had any e-mail contact with a Google representative even  
after multiple attempts to contact Google through the listed contact  
channels (Report an Error Form)

There has been no response to any of the multiple requests. In the event  
that this does not resolve the problem immediately, We will be filing a  
copyright infringement (or any other legal action possible) against
Google,  
for continuing to inaccurately list our location knowingly.

I can be contacted at b3nwatt@gmail.com,  ben@trutone.ca, or Tues - Sat  
10:00am - 6:00pm EST @ 905-270-3440.

We are treating this as a very serious problem, and will follow up with
the  
matter in due course.

We believe that it is the responsibility of Google to verify it's
listings,  
and be available to business owners to address errors such as this.  We  
would not be the first to complain about the inconsistent approach Google 

takes towards customer service and error correction.
